targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(stageType, pipelineId, le) (rate(query_stage_time_secs_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", pipelineId=~"$queryPipelineId", pipelineId!~"_lw_tmp_.*", stageType=~"$stage"}[1m])))

histogram_quantile(0.75, sum by(stageType, pipelineId, le) (rate(query_stage_time_secs_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", pipelineId=~"$queryPipelineId", pipelineId!~"_lw_tmp_.*", stageType=~"$stage"}[1m])))
